app.actions: Client Factory Server Actions (e.g., for Forms)

components.composites: combine primitives to create more complex components like forms, cards, etc.
components.elements: basic building block components like text, box, list, etc.
components.layouts: arrange other components on the screen like headers, footers, etc.
components.primitives: fundamental components with minimal styling and functionality like buttons, inputs, etc.
components.ui: reusable UI components like modals, toasts, etc.

application.useCases: application use cases (orchestrate specific business operations)

domain.services: domain services (business logic not tied to a specific entity)
domain.models: domain models and entities (definitions of core business objects)

shared.schemas: shared Zod schemas for validation and type definitions across client and server
shared.utils: shared utility functions and helpers used in both client and server
